description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}% and Reduces recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Recharge and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Reduces recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Hold Duration and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Hold Duration, Recharge and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.

UNIQUE -- Reduces recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and has a chance to apply a minor Damage Absorb effect on the caster.  This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 2 times per minute.
